did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Sarah Maria Everett Collection on James Madison1816-1907
did.abstract: December 9, 1816 Boston Gazette and a 1907 printed portrait of President James Madison.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of Item], The Sarah Maria Everett Collection on James Madison, 1816-1907, SC# 5039, Special Collections, Carrier Library, James Madison University, Harrisonburg, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Donation from Sarah Maria Everett during her senior year as a student at James Madison University.

custodhist.head: Provenance
custodhist.p: The newspaper was a gift to the donor from her parents, purchased from an antique dealer. The engraving was given to the donor by Pat Thompson, a longtime docent at Montpelier. This was a retirement gift to Thompson from staff at Montpelier who purchased it from Jentz Prints in Brunswick, Maryland.

bioghist.head: Biographical Information
bioghist.p: Donor was a recognized expert on James Madison during her time as a student at JMU and received several gifts of historical items that mention Madison.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The newspaper contains an address by President Madison on the second page. The engraving is a portrait and signature of James Madison with a small image of Montpelier beneath. "Copyright 1907 by Bureau of National Literature and Art."
